summary: An FBI email chain from July 2, 2019, regarding the indictment and impending arrest of Jeffrey Epstein. It details operational planning for his arrest upon return to the U.S., execution of a search warrant at his NYC residence, and deployment of agents to Florida to serve subpoenas and interview individuals.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; indicted in SDNY with an arrest warrant sworn out. Believed to be in France at the time.

connections.description: M., an FBI SSA, is leading the operational planning for the arrest and investigation of Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Indicted in SDNY
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was indicted in the Southern District of New York, and an arrest warrant was sworn out.

events.title: Operational Planning for Arrest
events.description: The FBI squad is placed on standby to plan for Epstein's arrest upon his return to the U.S., execution of a search warrant at his NYC residence, and interviews of co-conspirators.

events.title: Deployment to Florida
events.description: Two agents are to be deployed to Florida to serve subpoenas and attempt to interview 1-3 individuals.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was indicted in the Southern District of New York on July 2, 2019, triggering an active arrest warrant.
At the time of the email, Epstein was believed to be in France, and the FBI was planning for his imminent arrest upon any return to the United States.
The FBI's operational plan included executing a search warrant at Epstein's New York City residence and interviewing co-conspirators.
The FBI also planned to immediately deploy two agents to Florida to serve subpoenas and interview 1-3 individuals.
The email indicates the investigation was a major, urgent operation requiring the entire FBI squad and additional assistance.
